snippet: The most recent Great Music in a Great Space concert at the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine featured Kent Tritle conducting Bach’s Mass in B minor.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance by Cathedral Church of St John the Divine Choir and Orchestra, featuring Kent Tritle conducting, as part of the Great Music in a Great Space series.
lead_paragraph: The most recent Great Music in a Great Space concert at the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine featured Kent Tritle conducting Bach’s Mass in B minor.

headline.seo: Great Music in a Great Space at St. John the Divine
headline.main: Intimate Moments in a Voluminous Hall
headline.print_headline: Intimate Moments in a Voluminous Hall
